solution_line_template: If she divided each orange into {pieces_per_orange} pieces, she got {initial_oranges}*{pieces_per_orange} = <<{initial_oranges}*{pieces_per_orange}={total_pieces}>>{total_pieces} pieces of orange.
Since each friend received {pieces_per_friend} pieces, there were {total_pieces}/{pieces_per_friend} = <<{total_pieces}/{pieces_per_friend}={number_of_friends}>>{number_of_friends} friends.
